item.title: Every big announcement and trailer from Summer Game Fest 2024 | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Capcom Geoff Keighley‚Äôs annual game show delivered tons of loud trailers and quieter reveals It‚Äôs going to be a hot summer... for video games! Host Geoff Keighley‚Äôs annual showcase of what‚Äôs ...
item.content:encoded: Image: Capcom Geoff Keighley‚Äôs annual game show delivered tons of loud trailers and quieter reveals It‚Äôs going to be a hot summer... for video games! Host Geoff Keighley‚Äôs annual showcase of what‚Äôs to come in the world of gaming, Summer Game Fest, kicked off Friday with a two-hour extravaganza of game trailers, announcements, and surprise reveals. In addition to new looks at Capcom‚Äôs Monster Hunter Wilds, Atlus‚Äô Metaphor: ReFantazio, and Funcom‚Äôs Dune: Awakening, viewers were treated to plenty...

item.title: Palworld‚Äôs first major expansion adds Pals and a whole new island | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Pocketpair Inc. Sakurajima is the setting for the game‚Äôs first expansion Pocketpair, the developer behind surprise survival hit Palworld, announced the first expansion at Summer Games Fest 20...
item.content:encoded: Image: Pocketpair Inc. Sakurajima is the setting for the game‚Äôs first expansion Pocketpair, the developer behind surprise survival hit Palworld, announced the first expansion at Summer Games Fest 2024. The new update will include a new island, Sakurajima, which includes a Japanese-style shrine, a mushroom-laden swamp, and a scary graveyard. There‚Äôll also be new Pals, new Pal subspecies, a new faction and leader, and more. The update will have a major building overhaul, which is good news for t...

item.title: Valorant is coming to console, and it feels shockingly good to play | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Riot Games The limited beta begins next week Riot Games has officially announced that Valorant is coming to consoles. The announcement of the Xbox Series X and PlayStation 5 versions of the t...
item.content:encoded: Image: Riot Games The limited beta begins next week Riot Games has officially announced that Valorant is coming to consoles. The announcement of the Xbox Series X and PlayStation 5 versions of the tactical shooter came during the Summer Game Fest show on Friday, but Polygon had a chance to check out the game early and talk to its developers about how it translates to the new platforms. Bringing Valorant to consoles was a no-brainer for Riot, according to its developers. After all, in the studi...

item.title: Among Us developer Innersloth now funding a bunch of indies | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: InnerSloth Murdering imposters leads to new indie games Among Us was released in 2018, but it was in 2020 that the game absolutely blew up. The social deduction game bloomed from a simple con...
item.content:encoded: Image: InnerSloth Murdering imposters leads to new indie games Among Us was released in 2018, but it was in 2020 that the game absolutely blew up. The social deduction game bloomed from a simple concept with a single map into a worldwide phenomena that amassed more than half a billion monthly active players in November 2020, according to defunct research group SuperData. Among Us is free to play on mobile and $5 on consoles, but add in its wearables and you‚Äôve got a ton of money to work with. ...

item.title: Dune: Awakening story teased in new cinematic trailer | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Funcom Funcom says the MMO set on Arrakis will come to Steam, PS5, and Xbox Series X It‚Äôs been about a year and a half since we first caught wind of Dune: Awakening, the massively multiplayer...
item.content:encoded: Image: Funcom Funcom says the MMO set on Arrakis will come to Steam, PS5, and Xbox Series X It‚Äôs been about a year and a half since we first caught wind of Dune: Awakening, the massively multiplayer online survival game set on the planet of Arrakis. On Friday, Funcom released a story-focused trailer at Summer Game Fest, teasing that the game will focus on an alternate telling of the story of Paul Atreides ‚Äî but we‚Äôll have to wait until Gamescom in Aug. 2024 for a gameplay trailer. The game dro...

item.title: Blumhouse Games shows off six horror titles at Summer Game Fest | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Blumhouse Games From bull-headed beasts to futuristic simulations Blumhouse Productions is the studio behind many modern horror films, from Paranormal Activity and The Purge to Get Out and Fi...
item.content:encoded: Image: Blumhouse Games From bull-headed beasts to futuristic simulations Blumhouse Productions is the studio behind many modern horror films, from Paranormal Activity and The Purge to Get Out and Five Night at Freddy‚Äôs. Now, the business is expanding with Blumhouse Games, a game publishing arm. Jason Blum, founder of Blumhouse, was at Summer Game Fest Friday to announce a slate of six horror games that will release under Blumhouse. These games were chosen to be strange, experimental, and deepl...

item.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita‚Äôs Rewind¬†looks like a retro masterpiece | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Fight Rita and Robo-Rita in this street fighter I spent a lot of time playing Mighty Morphin Power Rangers on the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. Like, a lot. Thanks to Digital Eclipse, I‚Äôll be ...
item.content:encoded: Fight Rita and Robo-Rita in this street fighter I spent a lot of time playing Mighty Morphin Power Rangers on the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. Like, a lot. Thanks to Digital Eclipse, I‚Äôll be able to head right back into the world in Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita‚Äôs Rewind, announced Friday at Summer Game Fest. The Power Rangers will once again take on Rita ‚Äî and Rita. You see, Robo Rita from the future went back in time to fight alongside her younger self to defeat the Power Rangers...

item.title: Ex-Silent Hill devs show off new horror game Slitterhead, a gory mix of The Thing and Driver: San Francisco | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Bokeh Game Studio This is that good PS2-era jank The team of ex-Silent Hill developers known as Bokeh Game Studio gave horror fans a lengthy look at their new game Slitterhead on Friday at Su...
item.content:encoded: Image: Bokeh Game Studio This is that good PS2-era jank The team of ex-Silent Hill developers known as Bokeh Game Studio gave horror fans a lengthy look at their new game Slitterhead on Friday at Summer Game Fest, revealing something fans might not have expected. Slitterhead looks like less of a creeping, psychological horror game in the vein of Silent Hill or Siren, and more of an action game involving swords and guns. The intriguing twist, though, is that the weapons players will use to batt...

item.content:encoded: Image: The Game Awards/Twitch From Studio Zero and publisher Atlus Metaphor: ReFantazio will be released on Oct. 11, developer Studio Zero and publisher Atlus announced Friday at Geoff Keighley‚Äôs Summer Game Fest. item.content:encoded: Image: The Game Awards/Twitch One more ‚Äòjust one more turn‚Äô The next game in the Civilization turn-based strategy game franchise is coming in 2025. At Summer Game Fest on Friday, developer Firaxis and publisher 2K Games announced Sid Meier‚Äôs Civilization 7 with a big, history-spanning trailer.
